title: Personal Projects

projects.title: Voice-to-Voice Real-Time System
projects.description: Built voice to voice architecture and real-time systems using WebSockets and Bun runtime for high-performance communication.

projects.title: Quiz WebApp (RBS Modulation)
projects.description: Developed a scalable, optimized Quiz-WebApp with RBS modulation using Next.js and Nest.js.

projects.title: n8n AI Calling Agent Automation
projects.description: Automated workflows for AI Calling Agents using n8n, integrating real-time triggers and AI responses.

projects.title: Form Validation & UI Toolkit
projects.description: Experience with Next.js, Vite, and form validation using React Hook Form. Built responsive UIs with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Real-Time Dashboards & AI Interfaces
projects.description: Developed real-time dashboards and AI interfaces for analytics and automation.

projects.title: Mobile Device Management
projects.description: Monolithic Nest.js backend with secure authentication, UPI mandate handling, and remote device lock/unlock enforcement. Enabled fintech platform for EMI sales, loan repayments, and remote device management.

projects.title: AI CALLING AGENT – AI Lead Engagement & Support Platform
projects.description: Developed a multi-channel AI assistant for websites and WhatsApp to automate lead capture, support, and FAQs.

projects.title: Data-Extraction-System
projects.description: Monolithic Nest.js backend handles OCR, regex-based field extraction, and secure Gmail SMTP via OAuth2. Sharp and Tesseract.js pipeline processes PDFs/Images for high-accuracy text extraction. Optimized frontend built with Next.js.

projects.title: WordPress Portfolio Website
projects.description: Created and customized a personal portfolio website using WordPress, showcasing projects, skills, and achievements.
